You need to configure CompanyA's system to track the lost sales due to the discount.

Which three actions should you perform? Each correct answer presents part of the solution.

NOTE: Each correct selection is worth one point.

A company uses Dynamics 365 Sales Enterprise for lead management.

The system must perform the following functions:

• Send product promotion emails to contacts that have either a president or vice president title. New contacts with those titles must receive the emails automatically.
• Send a one-time email promotion to all who purchase the main company product and track who opens the email.

You need to configure the system.

What should you configure? To answer, select the appropriate options in the answer area.

NOTE: Each correct selection is worth one point.

discussion.content:

For all forecast templates, need to fill in Top of hierarchy. The other fields are pre-populated.

Selected Answer: A
B. Top of hierarchy: This parameter is used to define the topmost entity in the hierarchy. It doesn’t directly relate to configuring the forecast by territory.

C. Hierarchy entity: This parameter is used to define the entity that the hierarchy is based on. While it’s an important part of setting up a forecast, it doesn’t directly address the requirement of configuring the forecast by territory.

D. Roll up entity: This parameter defines how the data rolls up in the hierarchy. It’s used to aggregate data from lower levels to higher levels in the hierarchy. However, it doesn’t directly address the requirement of configuring the forecast by territory.

Remember, the goal here is to configure the forecast by territory, and the hierarchy relationship is the parameter that allows us to define relationships between different territories. Hence, option A is the correct answer.
This question was part of my exam on August 19
